programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Iceland: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Iceland is a land born out of fire, sculpted by ice. This unique island is home to some of the planet's rarest and most spectacular creatures and it harbors some of the most extreme environments on Earth.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert
programme.desc: In this episode of Wild Places, we join botanist Peter Latz, who believes the biggest influence on the Australian arid landscape has been fire. Years ago, Peter wondered how different this country would have looked like without the influence of it.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake and Amanda Seyfried co-star in this sci-fi thriller set in a future world where aging stops at 25, and the only way for one man to stay alive is to steal more time.

programme.title: Open Water: Open Water
programme.desc: When a couple is stranded while scuba diving, they soon realize they are in the middle of shark-infested waters in this intense, critically acclaimed thriller.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Old-school salesmen Billy (Vince Vaughn) and Nick (Owen Wilson) try to reboot their careers by joining Google’s fiercely competitive internship program — with hilarious results!

programme.title: Cave Dwellers
programme.desc: Newly-married wife Jenni can't tell if the skull she sees in her new home is a ghostly apparition of her husband's dead first wife, hallucinations from her own nervous condition... or something else.

programme.title: The Crawling Eye
programme.desc: Things start to look eerily familiar to scientists Crevett and Brooks when mountain climbers begin losing their heads in the Trollenberg Mountains.

programme.title: The Unearthly
programme.desc: A mad scientist creates havoc when an experiment to stop the aging process goes awry.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Eclipsalypso / Apocalypse Squirt
programme.desc: McGee summons the Moon Dervish who will bring the Apocalypse unless a sasquatch dances for him.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Terror form the Toybox / Slimeball Run
programme.desc: Buttsquat's Teddy Bear washes up at Camp Lakebottom and hypnotizes the Bottom Dwellers.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Escape from Lakebottom
programme.desc: McGee, Gretchen and Squirt arrive at Camp Lakebottom to find themselves held captive by a zombie.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Scare-A-Normal-Activity / Beast Feast
programme.desc: McGee vows to protect Lakebottom's secrets from the prying host of 'Paranormal Confronter.'

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Itchy Witchy Pizza Project / Breakout From Buttvault B
programme.desc: Gretchen, McGee and Squirt get trapped by witch who forces the campers into pizza slave labour.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Ants In Our Camp / Fanboy Freakout
programme.desc: McGee mistakenly concocts a spray that shrinks the campers to a microscopic size.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Bird Brains / The Real Vincent
programme.desc: Squirt is eager to assist his idol, Dr. Sapstein on his latest quest for the rare mocker bird.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Trouble In Spit Creek / The Spy Who Squatched Me
programme.desc: During a game of Stink Toss, McGee and Buttsquat get lost in the forest for what feels like days!

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Valley of the Iguanasquat / Legend of Wiggly's Gold
programme.desc: When the campers discover a prehistoric valley near Stinky Pits they also find a cursed gem.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Lakebo-tron / Rise of the Dawn of the Beginning of the Planet of Armand!
programme.desc: McGee and Buttsquat go head-to-head in an 80's style arcade game! But as the points build up, the boys become digitized inside the game. The kids head back through the Lakebottom inter-dimensional portal, hoping to find a Sasquatch version of the camp.

programme.title: World Poker Tour: WPT Cash Game $50/$100 No Limit Holdem 2022 - Part 3
programme.desc: Hollywood chef Paul Kuzmich is trying to cook up something special at the high-stakes cash table.

programme.desc: Phil Hellmuth takes his shot at high-stakes no-limit hold 'em cash.

programme.title: World Poker Tour: WPT Cash Game $25/$50 No Limit Holdem 2022 - Part 2
programme.desc: Phil Hellmuth has managed to keep his cool, but his table mates are ready to put him to the test.

programme.title: World Poker Tour: WPT Cash Game $25/$50 No Limit Holdem 2022 - Part 3
programme.desc: WPT Champion David Baker has found himself in a bit of a hole, but he is not ready to walk away just yet.

programme.desc: David Baker is finding every possible way to involve himself in big pots.

programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims. And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder. These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Blind Trust
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final four chefs prepare a special luncheon for 80 pregnant women, who choose their favourite dish and send the winner on a $1,000 shopping spree; during the dinner service, one chef gets careless and burns chef Ramsay's hand.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay invites the final three chefs and a few special guests to a breakfast he prepared, and asks the chefs to recreate a signature dish; the chefs each take a turn running the hot plate during the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs are rewarded with a trip to New York, where they are asked to prepare their signature dishes; the chefs must prove their skill and passion by designing and running their own restaurants; Whoopi Goldberg makes an appearance.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs have one last dinner service to prove that they have what it takes to work in chef Ramsay's restaurant; the winner is chosen.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 16 chefs are sent to the kitchen to create their signature dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One chef has a confrontation with Gordon Ramsay during the elimination round.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidson’s, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An old client brings in Ian to build a classic 54’ Chevy pickup truck from the ground up with some major custom upgrades.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ian’s most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel brings his wild fabrication skills into the world of Volkswagen bugs, as he turns a stock bug into a full custom.

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Drover’s has a squatter problem: somebody is lighting campfires. While tracking the culprit, Stevie (Simmone Jade Mackinnon) comes to grips with a mysterious and handsome stranger whom it turns out is her ex-husband, Jarred (Grant Bowler).

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: It’s sale day and Tess (Bridie Carter) is in a hurry to register her cattle so that they can get the best price. The truck stop is crowded with people wanting to do exactly the same thing.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg’s sister, Celia Rivers (Glenda Linscott), arrives at Drovers. Partly apprehensive, partly excited, Meg has always lived in the shadow of her glamorous, talented, singing sister. But Celia has arrived for a sea-change, or a country change.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg is full of preparations for her and Jodi’s leave taking, and in her excitement fails to notice that Jodi is harbouring a sliver of doubt.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The Bachelor and Spinsters Ball, five hours drive from Gungellan, is one of the major social events on the country calendar.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Stevie’s daughter Rose (Basia A’hern) turns up at Drovers unexpectedly. She’s run away from her Mum to live with her Aunty Stevie.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Naples, New York, to investigate the Naples Hotel.This hotel was built in 1895.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead & Breakfast
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates a 19thcentury Bed and Breakfast in Red Boiling Springs, Tennessee, built by the Cloyd family.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Moonshine & Madness
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters: slavery, murder and madness are behind the hauntings at the notorious Graham Mansion. TAPS travels to Virginia to determine the true source of the claims that have taken place at this historical location.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped in their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper-class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van.

programme.title: Operation Repo: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen e

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Outside the Box
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a baffling marital spat involving a man, his wife, and her untrustworthy yoga instructor. Then, Sonia and Lyndah hit the fashion district to repossess a van from a designer who's way ahead of the curve

programme.title: Operation Repo: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Involuntary Voluntary
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy's Bait and Lou's Cake
programme.desc: Lou and Matt inadvertently become pawns in an elaborate and misguided lesson perpetrated by a cheating husband upon his mistress. Then, Matt and Lou attempt to take a vehicle away from a debtor who is so drunk he doesn't remember agreeing

programme.title: Operation Repo: Blow-Up and Cool Down
programme.desc: Lou and Froy set out some bait in a gated community to attract a security guard who's slow to make his payments, but quick to pull out his pepper spray. Then, Matt and Lou crash a wedding to repo a car from a truant DJ, but will they be able to get away?

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah reclaim a riding mower from a housewife and her grab-happy husband. Then, Sonia and Matt head out on a scorcher of an afternoon for a repossession. Will they be able to beat both the heat and a pair of geriatric debtors?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: The Game: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: When Kelly learns that her role on the reality show is in jeopardy, she goes to extreme measures to stay relevant, which ultimately backfires with daughter Brittany and forces Kelley to re-evaluate her future in San Diego.

programme.title: The Game: A Very Special Episode
programme.desc: When Malik turns down the advances of the wife of the Sabers' owner, she becomes upset and returns with a vengeance, unwilling to take "no" for an answer.

programme.title: The Game: Whip It...Whip It Good
programme.desc: Jason decides to leave a wild Brittany with the ultimate babysitter... Tasha.

programme.title: The Game: Never Surrender!
programme.desc: Malik tries to end things with Parker so he can live an honest life with Jenna, but things don't go exactly as planned.

programme.title: The Game: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: When Tasha finds out her new man has a terminal illness, they spend his final days tackling their bucket lists.

programme.title: The Game: The Right To Choose Episode
programme.desc: After trying unsuccessfully to get pregnant, Melanie and Derwin visit a fertility specialist, but the visit to the fertility specialist reveals more than Melanie bargained for.

programme.title: The Game: Skeletons
programme.desc: In the fifth season premiere, Melanie contends with Derwin's abortion accusation by leading him to believe he was the father of a child she terminated in college.

programme.title: The Game: Truth Pact
programme.desc: In the second half of the fifth season opener, Melanie reveals a huge confession to Derwin regarding the abortion that he assumed was of their child.

programme.title: Run's House: Mole Beauty, Mole Problems
programme.desc: A trip to the orthodontist for Diggy and Russy brings the family some surprising news: That Russy will be getting his braces off before Diggy, who will have to wait another two months.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Ol' Wild West
programme.desc: With their Spring Break on the horizon, Diggy and Russy try to convince Rev and Justine to take them on a trip. Rev decides that the family should take the vacation package that he won in a Rush Philanthropic charity auction.

programme.title: Run's House: Age Against The Machine
programme.desc: With their first book written together, "Take Back Your Family," now complete, Rev and Jus begin the process of recording the book on tape version.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt1
programme.desc: With paranormal activity of every kind, Dorchester Prison isn’t for the faint hearted. Karl takes on the prison block where aggressive phantoms and poltergeists are said to roam.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the courtroom of one of Dorchester’s most historical buildings and is suddenly surrounded by unexplained occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P2
programme.desc: Under the main building of Dorchester Shire Hall there is a warren of tunnels and cells. Stuart enters this area that is said to house many a phantom.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: York Castle Museum
programme.desc: The history of York Castle Museum is almost endless as are the paranormal stories attached to it. Karl enters the street and cells with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Yvette takes Karl, Stuart and Mary into the vast Shrewsbury Prison. A place riddled with paranormal activity of every kind.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Yvette and Glen: Built on ancient ground, Hack Green Nuclear Bunker is a hot spot for paranormal activity. Yvette and Glen go it alone and soon experience the bunkers reputation first-hand.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Cindy
programme.desc: An aspiring actress wants to be accepted for who she really is, not in the image her well-meaning dad tries to transform her into.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Devil and Jonathan Smith
programme.desc: Mark has been tricked into selling his soul in order to save a little girl's life. But the Devil has another agenda: acquiring Jonathan's soul.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Factory workers ignore ground-water contamination, even though it is making their children sick. As a result, Jonathan takes drastic measures to force them to face the facts.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Popcorn, Peanuts and Crackerjacks
programme.desc: A minor-league baseball team never wins, so Jonathan and Mark set out to help them. They also come to the aid of an elderly vendor who has been kicked out of the stadium.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Smile in the Third Row
programme.desc: The lead actor in a Broadway play claims that God is attending the show's performances, sitting in a third-row orchestra seat.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Secret
programme.desc: The teenage daughter of Mark's friend tries to find her biological mother. It may tear the family apart.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: In his role as State Vet, Danny works with wealthy conservationist, Anton Ziegler, to catch a group of leopard hunters. Ziegler is also buying a tiger from Vanessa, who struggling with her finances, desperately needs the money to ensure Mara's future.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Du Plessis has started a one man campaign of vandalism against the new neighbours at Mara; Peeters and the mining company. When Peeters catches him on CCTV, Du Plessis is fined and given a restraining order to keep him away from Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Du Plessis comes to meet Caroline's plane but he doesn't seem happy – he has seen that the mining company have already started building the road which threatens Leopard's Den.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: The family are making arrangements to leave Leopard's Den, all except Du Plessis who is steadfastly refusing to accept that he has lost his home. He won't use his share of the money from the sale of the land to buy somewhere else.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: The family have been squatting at Leopard's Den as they prepare to make their last stand to prevent the bulldozers from destroying their home. Du Plessis and Fatani bring elephants and a giraffe to dissuade the construction crew from moving in.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A army vet is found bleeding to death on the asphalt of a parking lot -- his chest littered with too many knife wounds to count. Kenda’s case is stuck in first gear until a gruesome clue appears.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: Kenda encounters one of the most horrendous crime scenes of his career, but his hunt for a homicidal maniac leads him to the most unexpected of killers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Loose Cannon

programme.title: Arthur: Summer Stories
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: Get Smart/Baby Steps

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland

programme.title: Arthur: The Curse of the Grebes/Arthur Changes Gears

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Rides Again/Arthur Makes The Team

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Dunkirk (September 1, 1939)

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Poland

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Norway (Early 1940)
programme.desc: Early in the war, the Germans decide they need to guarantee access to the Norwegian port of Narvik to ensure their supplies of Swedish iron ore. The British, however, send destroyers to up-end the German plan.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Bombing of England (Fall 1940)
programme.desc: After invading France, Hitler is planning to cross the Channel. His only obstacle is the Royal Air Force. Throughout the summer of 1940, both sides lose an incredible number of daring flyers.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Tobruk

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Operation Mercury

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Malta (June 1941)
programme.desc: In 1941, Mussolini desperately wants to wrest the tiny island of Malta from the British for control of the Mediterranean. When his inadequate air force fails to bomb the Maltese into submission, Hitler's Luftwaffe joins the campaign.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Fall of Singapore (October 1941)
programme.desc: Before the sneak attack on Pearl Harbor, the Japanese initiate the Pacific War by firing on the British in Malaya. Their route to the rubber-rich nation takes them into Singapore, the World's most armed fortress.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Pearl Harbor (December 7, 1941)
programme.desc: During a two-hour surprise attack on the American Pacific fleet anchored at Pearl Harbor, Japanese navy pilots score a near-complete victory.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of the Philippines
programme.desc: Examining the Japanese invasion of the Philippines in December 1941.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Bad Bet

programme.desc: A report on the unsolved abduction and murder of 16-year-old Molly Bish. Bish disappeared in June 2000 from the local swimming hole. In May 2003, Tim McGuigan, a former police officer, helped discover evidence that lead to the discovery of Molly’s body.

programme.title: South Park: Go God Go XII (Part 2)
programme.desc: Go God Go XII (2): Cartman is stuck in the future, caught up in a battle between atheists and sea otters! And what will become of Richard Dawkins and Mrs. Garrison's love affair? (S10, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Stanley's Cup
programme.desc: Stanley's Cup: In a parody of underdog sports films, Stan is sentenced to community service and ends up coaching the Park County Pee-Wee hockey team - can he turn these losers into winners? (S10, E14)

programme.title: South Park: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
programme.desc: With Apologies to Jessie Jackson: Randy faces public ridicule for using the &quot;N&quot; word on live TV. Cartman can't resist teasing a little person who comes to school to teach about prejudice. (S11, E01)

programme.desc: Cartman Sucks: After being caught in a compromising position with Eric, Butters is sent to a special camp to &quot;Pray the Gay Away&quot;. Cartman tries to retrieve the incriminating photo. (S11, E02)

programme.title: Property Brothers: Debra & Dan

programme.desc: Candace and John St. Clair explore a haunted tunnel with a gruesome history where slaves were buried alive. Stealthily, an uninvited guest follows them home. Attacked by the entity, they invite paranormal experts to investigate and cleanse the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Hunter

programme.desc: Kim and Craig move into their dream home in rural Bagley, Iowa with Kim’s two young daughters. When an unseen entity attacks the family, Kim and Craig realize they could be dealing with a ghost. They turn to a demonologist to help them reclaim the house.

programme.title: A Haunting: Blood Visions
programme.desc: Faced with a supernatural threat, Betty Johnson and her family move hoping to leave their troubles behind. But when Betty’s oldest child starts experiencing bloody visions and is physically attacked, the family realizes "it" has followed them.
